moves.3... Bb4 4. Bb5+ c6 5. Bd3 dxe4: Doesn't double up pawns with Bxc3??
moves.8. Nf3: Horses at the 3 line. strong offense.
moves.8... h6 9. Bxf6 Qxf6: Queen @ F6 . Opponents play that alot.. I don't like.
moves.13. g3 Qg4 14. Ne5 Nxe5 15. dxe5: Queen threat, trade knight, pawn on 5 line.
moves.15... f6 16. f3 Qh3: Queen in worthless spot for rest of game.
moves.17. Qd6 Rf7: Dumb move. Should of went f6xe5.
moves.18. exf6 Rxf6 19. Qd8+ Rf8 20. Qd3: Moved queen back into line with bishop.
moves.20... e5 21. Rae1: Setting up control of d-f line of board.
moves.21... Kf7: Dumb move. should of moved queen to d7.
moves.24... Kxf8 25. Bh7: Jered's bishop line. Game over unless he moves the queen.
